summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows a character navigating through a dense, forested environment with lush greenery and large rocks. The character is seen from behind, holding a staff and moving uphill. The user interface (UI) elements include a health bar at the bottom left, which is partially depleted, and an icon indicating the collection of "Aged Ginseng x2" on the right side of the screen. Additionally, there are some hexagonal icons in the bottom right corner, likely representing abilities or items. The environment appears to be part of an exploration or adventure game, with the character collecting resources.
